CustomField.formula: IF( or(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'open'),ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Re-open'),ISPICKVAL(Status, 'On Hold'),ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Open-Rejected')) , IF(Age_in_Hours__c<10, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Green") , IF( AND(Age_in_Hours__c>=10, Age_in_Hours__c<=18) , IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "Yellow") , IF(Age_in_Hours__c>18, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Red") , null) ) ) , null)
CustomField.label: SLA Flag Status
